meanings.sent1: The unrulier puppy kept running around the house.
meanings.sent2: The children became unrulier as the party went on.
meanings.sent3: The unrulier kitten knocked over the vase with a playful leap.
meanings.sent4: The unrulier wind tossed the leaves in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The unrulier behavior of the students disrupted the class.

meanings.sent1: The unrulier child refused to sit still during the story.
meanings.sent2: The storm grew unrulier as the night progressed.
meanings.sent3: The unrulier squirrel chattered loudly from the tree.
meanings.sent4: The unrulier river rushed over the rocks with great force.
meanings.sent5: The unrulier crowd pushed and shoved to get closer to the stage.
